model.name: NAD two compartment competition model NADA vs NamPT

functionDefinition.name: Competitie inhibition two substrates s2 const scaling
Product inhibition two susbtrates s2 const scaling

rdf:Description.dcterms:description: original work calf Km and kcat calculated with MW of 92kDa
Km from recombinant human enzyme, similar to mouse Km
turnover calculated from enzyme 1300 fold purified from porcine liver, Km=0.83

body.pre:
cell size HeLa 3e-12 l fibro blast 1e-12l
maximal E. coli uptake NA http://www.jbc.org/content/248/14/5144.full.pdf 630 molceules per cell and s
thus approx. 1 miktoM/ls
HeLa (epithelial; 8.2 0.3 fmol/10 min), NIH-3T3 cells : The apparent Km of NAD transport was 190 M while the Vmax was 429 pmol/well/10 min. http://www.jbc.org/content/283/10/6367.full
(1.2e6 cells per well according to thermo fisher cell culture specifications)
thus approx. 0.2 mikroM/s
15mg uptake per 60kg body = 2.5e-8 mmol/ls
Kcat calculated from vmax of purified enzyme (600nmol/min*mg) using an MW of 23193 g/mol for NMN

rdf:Description.dcterms:description: Vmax of purified anzyme and Km for NR

body.pre: Parameter have to be adjusted for NAR...currently NR affinities are used
